original_title: The Harlem Globetrotters Meet Snow White
overview: Animated TV Special  Traditional Animation  Hanna-Barbera, Saperstein Productions  Cartoon Characters: Snow White, "Curly" Neal, "Geese" Ausbie, Marques, Li'l John, Dunbar, Nate, Baby Face Paige, Prince, Marva, Queen of Grimmania, Count Revolta.
